content:
The University of Tennessee is helping to organize an environmental

education management center in Hong Kong PERIOD Money for this new center came

from a  grant given by the State Environmental Initiative

program PERIOD

This grant was given to the UT Energy Environment and Resources Center to

establish the center at the Hong Kong Polytechnic Institute said Jack

Barkenbus executive director of the EERC PERIOD This initiative grant is from

the Council of State Governments PERIOD

UT will be working with the U.S.Asia Environmental Partnership and the

Tennessee Department of Economic and Community Development PERIOD

Faculty and staff from the UT Colleges of Business Administration and

Engineering will be teaming up with the World Resources Institute in

Washington D.C PERIOD to design the curriculum and teach the courses at the

center PERIOD

This new center is being set up to encourage businesses in Hong Kong to

adopt environmental management techniques practiced by organizations in

Tennessee PERIOD

 Barkenbus said PERIOD

The UT Energy Environment and Resources Center was founded in  PERIOD The

EERC tries to find solutions to problems in the areas of energy

environmental resources technology and economic development PERIOD
